item.description:
Ernie D to coordinate
Here is the preliminary ride route. I plan on leaving the Middleboro rotary (Friendly's) at 8:00 and traveling up I-495N to rte 2W to Shelburne Falls. When we leave there we will make our way to rte 112S to rte 9E to home.

This is going to have some major highway and lots of secondary roads. I plan on getting back home around 6:30-7:00.
This is about a 200 mile day.
We will be stopping every 11/4 -11/2 hours or when needed.

Meet time 7:30am leave at 8am sharp. Please show up with a full tank and empty bladder.
Meet Place: Friendly''s at the Middleboro rotary
item.name: Shelburn Falls
